2484.T.summary: Demae-Can Co., Ltd operates delivery site Demae-can in Japan. The company provides food delivery service that enables its users to order from a range of restaurants. It also sells bottles of shochu, wine, and other beverages then to restaurants. The company was formerly known as Yume no Machi Souzou Iinkai Co., Ltd. Demae-Can Co., Ltd was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

2652.T.summary: Mandarake Inc. manages old books and antique stores in Japan. The company provides comics/light novels, books, magazines, toys, dolls, doujins, disks/games, idols/voice actors, cards/stickers, anime cels/scripts, illustration signed books, art, and other products. It also edits and sells in-house publications. In addition, the company sells its products online. Mandarake Inc. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2673.T.summary: YUMEMITSUKETAI Co.,Ltd. engages in the mail order retail business in Japan. The company is also involved in the nursing care and real estate businesses. YUMEMITSUKETAI Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3031.T.summary: RACCOON HOLDINGS, Inc. creates and provides infrastructure for BtoB transactions in Japan. It operates SUPER DELIVERY, a wholesale purchasing site for manufacturers of apparel and general good, and businesses, such as retail stores, restaurants, or hair salons; COREC, a cloud-based ordering system; and SD Export for developing overseas market. The company also offers Paid, a BtoB payment service; accounts receivables guarantee services; guaranteed online services for small and medium-sized business; and rents guarantee services for individuals and business use for offices or stores. The company was formerly known as Raccoon Co., Ltd. and changed its name to RACCOON HOLDINGS, Inc. in November 2018. RACCOON HOLDINGS, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3071.T.summary: Stream Co.,Ltd. engages in the Internet mail order business in Japan. It is also involved in online mail order support and online gaming activities; and develops and sells cosmetics. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3092.T.summary: ZOZO, Inc. operates online shopping Websites in Japan and internationally. It operates consignment shop, which includes various brand stores under the ZOZOTOWN name as a tenant; purchased stock shop that purchases and sells fashion merchandise of various brands; ZOZOUSED, which buys and sells used fashion-related merchandise from individual users; PayPay mall, an online shopping mall; and WEAR, a fashion app. The company also sells in-house designed apparel products; and offers various services, such as system and application development, WEB design, CRM, technology development, research and development, logistics contracting, and marketing services. In addition, it engages in the advertisement business. The company was formerly known as Start Today Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZOZO, Inc. in October 2018. ZOZO, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan. ZOZO, Inc. is a subsidiary of Z Holdings Corporation.

3134.T.summary: Hamee Corp. engages in the e-commerce and platform businesses in Japan and internationally. It engages in the planning and wholesale of mobile goods and smartphone accessories; and development and provision of Next Engine, a cloud-type business management platform for Internet mail order business operators. It is also involved in the investment business. The company was formerly known as Macrowill Company. Hamee Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Odawara, Japan.

3135.T.summary: MarketEnterprise Co.,Ltd operates an online shop for reusable goods in Japan. It operates approximately 40 sites on Web and mobile platforms. The company also sells items on Yahoo! Auctions. In addition, it purchases and sells used agricultural equipment. MarketEnterprise Co.,Ltd was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3138.T.summary: Fujisan Magazine Service Co., Ltd. operates an online bookstore for magazines in Japan. The company handles over 10,000 magazines and over 2,500 digital magazines. It delivers magazine content in paper, personal computer, tablet, and smartphone formats. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3179.T.summary: Syuppin Co., Ltd. operates e-commerce websites for buying and selling used products in Japan. It offers cameras, watches, writing instruments, and road bikes. The company also operates stores. Syuppin Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3192.T.summary: Shirohato Co., Ltd. operates an online shopping Website in Japan. The company offers innerwear for men and women. It also operates directly managed store under the SHIROHATO name. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

3319.T.summary: Golf Digest Online Inc. engages in the e-commerce business in Japan and internationally. It operates GDO GOLF SHOP, an online golf shop that provides golf equipment. The company also buys and sells used golf equipment at store locations; and manages Golf lesson studio and a junior golf school. In addition, it provides golf course reservation services through the Internet, telephone, and mobile, as well as golf course sales support services. Further, the company engages in the Internet media business, which include providing golf news/information distribution, community services, etc. and provision of mobile services. Golf Digest Online Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3328.T.summary: BEENOS Inc. operates in the e-commerce business in Japan and internationally. It operates through E-Commerce and Incubation segments. The E-Commerce segment provides overseas forwarding and proxy purchasing services through tenso.com and Buyee; global shopping business through sekaimon; and internet shopping and buy-back business through Brandear. This segment also engages in the liquor mediation business through JOYLAB; and entertainment and global product businesses. The Incubation segment engages in investment and consultation, and pre-monetized startup businesses. The company was formerly known as netprice.com, Ltd. and changed its name to BEENOS Inc. in October 2014. BEENOS Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3396.T.summary: Felissimo Corporation sells a range of lifestyle products in Japan. It primarily offers fashion goods, household goods, handmade kits, beauty related products, and food products. The company sells its products through catalogs and internet. Felissimo Corporation was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

3416.T.summary: PIXTA Inc. operates an online marketplace site of stock photos, illustrations, vectors, and footage in Japan. It primarily serves designers, web directors, publishers, or other creative professionals. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3556.T.summary: RenetJapanGroup,Inc. engages in Internet reuse and small home appliance recycling businesses in Japan. The company offers used books, CDs, DVDs, game software, branded goods, and precious metals under the NET OFF brand. It also provides used small electronic devices, etc. under the ReNet.jp brand In addition, the company engages in vehicle sales, leasing, and microfinance businesses. RenetJapanGroup,Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

3558.T.summary: LOCONDO, Inc. operates a mail order site for providing shoes. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3658.T.summary: eBOOK Initiative Japan Co.,Ltd. offers e-book sales services in Japan and internationally. The company engages in the provision of content digitization and distribution services; planning, development, and production of electronic content; editing and publishing of books and magazines; and paper book online sales services business. It operates ebookJapan, an e-book sales service; and bookfan, an online book sales service. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3660.T.summary: istyle Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates a beauty portal site @cosme in Japan and internationally. The company also provides Internet advertising/marketing services. In addition, it operates @ cosme shopping, a cosmetics e-commerce site and cosmetics specialty store under the @ cosme store name; and wholesales cosmetics. Further, the company operates @ cosme salon, a site that offers hair and beauty salons information; at cosmetics career, a site, which provides job offer services specialized in beauty industry; @cosme blog, a beauty blog site for beauty gurus and professionals to share information. Additionally, it offers A-Beauty, a web magazine catering; @cosme diet, a diet information site that research and find diets; @cosme hairsalon, a site for beauty and hair salon search and booking; Cooking School Park, a site for cooking, baking, and confectionery classes; mognavi, a food information site for storebought food products, restaurant menus, mail-order food products, and more; eatsmart, a food and health site to help develop better eating habits with a calorie checker and a social media health journal; BeautyTech.jp, a digital magazine; HERMO, a cosmetics online retail site; UrCosme, a cosmetics information site; and MakeupAlley, an america's beauty community site. The company was formerly known as I-Style Co., Ltd. and changed its name to istyle Inc. in April 2000. istyle Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3779.T.summary: J Escom Holdings,Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the sale of products related to beauty and beauty consumables in Japan. The company operates through Beauty and Beauty; Education Consulting; Publishing-Related; and Mail Order segments. It provides consulting services for companies; TV and Internet mail orders services, as well as publishes magazine under the Soup name. The company was formerly known as ESCOM Co., Ltd. and changed its name to J Escom Holdings,Inc. in 2005. J Escom Holdings,Inc. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3964.T.summary: Aucnet Inc. provides information distribution services for auctions. It operates through Automobile Business, Digital Product Business, and Consumer Product Business segments. The Automobile Business segment is involved in the vehicle auctions, shared inventory market, and live-linked auction; and provision of proxy bidding service, used vehicle inspection service, and other services. The Digital Product Business segment auctions used digital equipment, including used smartphones and used PCs, as well as offers services pertaining to distribution. The Consumer Product Business segment auctions pre-owned luxury brand items, and provides services pertaining to distribution. It also auctions motorcycles, flowers, and medical related business. In addition, the company engages in the provision of BPO support services, such as clearance, conversion, and resale of excess inventories; and financial businesses. The company was formerly known as FTS Inc. and changed its name to Aucnet Inc. in September 1984. Aucnet Inc. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4017.T.summary: Creema Ltd. operates as an online marketplace for creators and consumers to sell and buy handmade products directly online in Japan. The company helps users to find products in various categories, such as accessories and jewelry, plush toys and figurines, bags/backpacks, miscellaneous goods/stationeries, wallets/accessory cases, pet goods, iPhone/smartphone/pc cases, products for babies/kids, fashion items, wedding related products, furniture, products for men, interior miscellaneous goods, handmade materials, art products, food/liquor/drink items, and tableware/kitchen products. It also arranges exhibitions and events at permanent stores for creators. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

4385.T.summary: Mercari, Inc. engages in the planning, development, and operation of the Mercari marketplace applications in Japan, the United States, and the United Kingdom. Its marketplace applications allow individuals to buy and sell new and used items, such as electronics, jewelries, clothes, and shoes; and books, CDs, and DVDs. The company is also involved in the planning, development, and management of internet services. Mercari, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

4449.T.summary: giftee Inc. provides a service to send a message card with a gift through LINE or email. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

4755.T.summary: Rakuten Group, Inc. offers Internet services in Japan, the Americas, Europe, rest of Asia, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Internet Services, FinTech, and Mobile segments. The Internet Services segment operates various e-commerce sites, including Rakuten Ichiba, an Internet shopping mall; Rakuten Travel, online travel and reservation website; Rakuten Rewards, a membership-based online cash-back site; Rakuten Fashion, an online brand fashion store; Rakuten Books, online book, CD, and DVD stores; Rakuten 24 daily necessities sales service; Rakuten Seiyu Netsuper, an online grocery delivery service; Rakuten Bic, an electronics e-commerce site; Rakuten Rebates, a point-back service; Rakuma, a consumer-to-consumer mobile e-commerce app; Rakuten Super Logistics, a distribution and fulfillment services; Rakuten Drone, Drone / UGV delivery service; Rakuten Gora, an online golf course reservations; and Rakuten Marketing. This segment also offers investment services, such as Rakuten Capita; and E-book services, including, Rakuten Kobo, as well as manages professional sports teams, such as Rakuten Eagles and Vissel Kobe. The FinTech segment provides Rakuten Card services; payment services, including Rakuten Pay; and asset-based financial services, such as Rakuten Bank, Rakuten Securities, and Rakuten Life and General Insurance. The Mobile segment provides Rakuten Mobile, which offers mobile virtual network operator services; Rakuten Viber, which provides messaging and VoIP services; Rakuten Communications; and Rakuten Energy, which provides electricity and energy-related services and solutions. It also offers Rakuten Farm, an agricultural service that provides the delivery of organic produce, as well as operates an online organic produce store. The company was formerly known as Rakuten, Inc. and changed its name to Rakuten Group, Inc. in April 2021. Rakuten Group, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

73L.F.summary: Belluna Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the mail order industry. The company operates through seven segments: General Mail Order, Specialty Mail Order, Retail Store Sales, Solution, Finance, Property, and Other. The General Mail Order segment handles mail order sales of daily life-related merchandise, including clothing, sundry goods, household goods and furniture, and related services through various media, including catalogs and internet. The Specialty Mail Order segment engages in the mail order sales of specialty single items comprising food, wine, cosmetics and supplements, health food, and nursing supplies. The Retail Store Sales segment is involved in the retail of casual clothing, Japanese clothing-related merchandise, etc. The Finance segment provides consumer financing services. The Solution segment provides services to corporate clients, such as enclosing and mailing of sales promotion materials with catalogs and products. This segment also offers order-processing, direct marketing, and product dispatch services. The Property segment engages in the rental of real estate, remodeling and development of real estate, hotel business, etc. The Other segment is involved in the clothing rental, wholesale businesses, management of golf courses, etc. Belluna Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Ageo, Japan.

7685.T.summary: BuySell Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides Internet-type reuse services in Japan. The company offers kimonos, branded goods, fur, jewelry, and watches through its own e-commerce site Bicell Online, and EC mall. It also provides statement and governance services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7695.T.summary: Koukandekirukun, Inc. engages in the sale of housing equipment online. The company offers built-in gas stoves, IH cooking heaters, range food, dishwashers, water heaters, toilets, warm water washing toilet seats, faucet/faucets, cupboards, washbasin/vanity products, bathroom dryers, gas clothes dryers, delivery boxes, ventilation fans, and built-in ovens. Koukandekirukun, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8005.T.summary: Scroll Corporation primarily engages in the mail-order and e-commerce businesses in Japan. The company's mail-order business offers fashionable items for working women; casual items for adults; items for everyday activities, such as yoga, walking, and swimming; shoes, bags, and accessories; and undergarments and nightwear for women and their families. Its e-commerce business provides cosmetics; bags, wallets, watches, and accessories; beauty and diet products, and health related goods; interior furniture, sundries, and storage goods; frill and lace sleeping gears, and curtains; and fishing gears, camping equipment, outdoor equipment, disaster stockpiles items, and preserved food. In addition, the company offers skin care products, health and beauty products for woman, health food products, and make-up products; and logistics services. Further, it provides B2B solutions for e-commerce and mail order/online shopping business providers; and domestic travel, as well as travel planning and operations services covering one-day sightseeing bus tours, ski tours, and bus tours for foreign tourists visiting Japan. The company was formerly known as Mutow Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Scroll Corporation in October 2009. Scroll Corporation was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

8165.T.summary: Senshukai Co., Ltd. engages in the mail order, bridal, and corporate businesses in Japan. The company provides lifestyle products in various genres through catalogs, as well as Belle Maison Net. online shop; and products and services to corporations through catalogue sales. It also offers credit cards and insurance products; and manufacture products using natural water from Hokuto City. In addition, the company operates house wedding style wedding ceremony facilities; and 11 child daycare facilities in Tokyo and the Chiba Prefecture, and Osaka. Senshukai Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1946 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9272.T.summary: Boutiques, Inc. engages in e-commerce, exhibition, M&A intermediation, and media businesses. It operates in the mail order business of nursing care products; and provides M&A support services for nursing care business. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9997.T.summary: Belluna Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the mail order industry. The company operates through seven segments: General Mail Order, Specialty Mail Order, Retail Store Sales, Solution, Finance, Property, and Other. The General Mail Order segment handles mail order sales of daily life-related merchandise, including clothing, sundry goods, household goods and furniture, and related services through various media, including catalogs and internet. The Specialty Mail Order segment engages in the mail order sales of specialty single items comprising food, wine, cosmetics and supplements, health food, and nursing supplies. The Retail Store Sales segment is involved in the retail of casual clothing, Japanese clothing-related merchandise, etc. The Finance segment provides consumer financing services. The Solution segment provides services to corporate clients, such as enclosing and mailing of sales promotion materials with catalogs and products. This segment also offers order-processing, direct marketing, and product dispatch services. The Property segment engages in the rental of real estate, remodeling and development of real estate, hotel business, etc. The Other segment is involved in the clothing rental, wholesale businesses, management of golf courses, etc. Belluna Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Ageo, Japan.

IY5.F.summary: istyle Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates a beauty portal site @cosme in Japan and internationally. The company also provides Internet advertising/marketing services. In addition, it operates @ cosme shopping, a cosmetics e-commerce site and cosmetics specialty store under the @ cosme store name; and wholesales cosmetics. Further, the company operates @ cosme salon, a site that offers hair and beauty salons information; at cosmetics career, a site, which provides job offer services specialized in beauty industry; @cosme blog, a beauty blog site for beauty gurus and professionals to share information. Additionally, it offers A-Beauty, a web magazine catering; @cosme diet, a diet information site that research and find diets; @cosme hairsalon, a site for beauty and hair salon search and booking; Cooking School Park, a site for cooking, baking, and confectionery classes; mognavi, a food information site for storebought food products, restaurant menus, mail-order food products, and more; eatsmart, a food and health site to help develop better eating habits with a calorie checker and a social media health journal; BeautyTech.jp, a digital magazine; HERMO, a cosmetics online retail site; UrCosme, a cosmetics information site; and MakeupAlley, an america's beauty community site. The company was formerly known as I-Style Co., Ltd. and changed its name to istyle Inc. in April 2000. istyle Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MCARY.short_name: MERCARI INC UNSPON ADS EACH REP
MCARY.summary: Mercari, Inc. engages in the planning, development, and operation of the Mercari marketplace applications in Japan, the United States, and the United Kingdom. Its marketplace applications allow individuals to buy and sell new and used items, such as electronics, jewelries, clothes, and shoes; and books, CDs, and DVDs. The company is also involved in the planning, development, and management of internet services. Mercari, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

MRCIF.summary: Mercari, Inc. engages in the planning, development, and operation of the Mercari marketplace applications in Japan, the United States, and the United Kingdom. Its marketplace applications allow individuals to buy and sell new and used items, such as electronics, jewelries, clothes, and shoes; and books, CDs, and DVDs. The company is also involved in the planning, development, and management of internet services. Mercari, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

R8C.F.summary: RACCOON HOLDINGS, Inc. creates and provides infrastructure for BtoB transactions in Japan. It operates SUPER DELIVERY, a wholesale purchasing site for manufacturers of apparel and general good, and businesses, such as retail stores, restaurants, or hair salons; COREC, a cloud-based ordering system; and SD Export for developing overseas market. The company also offers Paid, a BtoB payment service; accounts receivables guarantee services; guaranteed online services for small and medium-sized business; and rents guarantee services for individuals and business use for offices or stores. The company was formerly known as Raccoon Co., Ltd. and changed its name to RACCOON HOLDINGS, Inc. in November 2018. RACCOON HOLDINGS, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

RAK.F.summary: Rakuten Group, Inc. offers Internet services in Japan, the Americas, Europe, rest of Asia, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Internet Services, FinTech, and Mobile segments. The Internet Services segment operates various e-commerce sites, including Rakuten Ichiba, an Internet shopping mall; Rakuten Travel, online travel and reservation website; Rakuten Rewards, a membership-based online cash-back site; Rakuten Fashion, an online brand fashion store; Rakuten Books, online book, CD, and DVD stores; Rakuten 24 daily necessities sales service; Rakuten Seiyu Netsuper, an online grocery delivery service; Rakuten Bic, an electronics e-commerce site; Rakuten Rebates, a point-back service; Rakuma, a consumer-to-consumer mobile e-commerce app; Rakuten Super Logistics, a distribution and fulfillment services; Rakuten Drone, Drone / UGV delivery service; Rakuten Gora, an online golf course reservations; and Rakuten Marketing. This segment also offers investment services, such as Rakuten Capita; and E-book services, including, Rakuten Kobo, as well as manages professional sports teams, such as Rakuten Eagles and Vissel Kobe. The FinTech segment provides Rakuten Card services; payment services, including Rakuten Pay; and asset-based financial services, such as Rakuten Bank, Rakuten Securities, and Rakuten Life and General Insurance. The Mobile segment provides Rakuten Mobile, which offers mobile virtual network operator services; Rakuten Viber, which provides messaging and VoIP services; Rakuten Communications; and Rakuten Energy, which provides electricity and energy-related services and solutions. It also offers Rakuten Farm, an agricultural service that provides the delivery of organic produce, as well as operates an online organic produce store. The company was formerly known as Rakuten, Inc. and changed its name to Rakuten Group, Inc. in April 2021. Rakuten Group, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ZOZO, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan. ZOZO, Inc. is a subsidiary of Z Holdings Corporation.

SATLF.summary: ZOZO, Inc. operates online shopping Websites in Japan and internationally. It operates consignment shop, which includes various brand stores under the ZOZOTOWN name as a tenant; purchased stock shop that purchases and sells fashion merchandise of various brands; ZOZOUSED, which buys and sells used fashion-related merchandise from individual users; PayPay mall, an online shopping mall; and WEAR, a fashion app. The company also sells in-house designed apparel products; and offers various services, such as system and application development, WEB design, CRM, technology development, research and development, logistics contracting, and marketing services. In addition, it engages in the advertisement business. The company was formerly known as Start Today Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZOZO, Inc. in October 2018. ZOZO, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan. ZOZO, Inc. is a subsidiary of Z Holdings Corporation.

In addition, it engages in the advertisement business. The company was formerly known as Start Today Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZOZO, Inc. in October 2018. ZOZO, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan. ZOZO, Inc. is a subsidiary of Z Holdings Corporation.

YAHOF.summary: Z Holdings Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in media and commerce businesses in Japan. The company's Media Business segment offers Internet-based advertising-related services, such as paid search, display advertising, and other advertising related services; information listing services; and other corporate services. The Commerce Business segment provides e-commerce related, membership, and settlement and finance related services. The company also offers cloud-related services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

YUMSF.summary: Demae-Can Co., Ltd operates delivery site Demae-can in Japan. The company provides food delivery service that enables its users to order from a range of restaurants. It also sells bottles of shochu, wine, and other beverages then to restaurants. The company was formerly known as Yume no Machi Souzou Iinkai Co., Ltd. Demae-Can Co., Ltd was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
